## Restock Recommendation

| Parameter                         | Value                                     |
|-----------------------------------|-------------------------------------------|
| Recommended Order Size            | 15,000 units                            |
| Rationale                         | Ordering 15,000 units allows for sufficient buffer to cover forecasted demand for the next 5 days, while also accounting for potential fluctuations in sales. This quantity also allows for optimal use of vendor order quantities, preventing unnecessary excess inventory.   |
| Comparison with Player's Plan     | The recommended order size exceeds the player's planned order size, indicating a need to proactively secure inventory to ensure sufficient stock levels. |
| Estimated Stock Turnover Days     | 3 days (calculated based on the recommended order size and forecasted demand) |
| Forecasted Demand Coverage Days   | 5 days (based on the forecasted demand)   |
| Comments                          | This recommendation balances the need to meet demand with the risk of overstocking. By ordering 15,000 units, we are able to meet forecasted demand for the next 5 days while also having a buffer in case demand exceeds expectations. This approach helps minimize stockouts and optimizes inventory turnover. |
